title: Technology & Media
description: Navigate the digital world in Bulgarian: computers, internet, social media, and modern communication.

objectives.description: Discuss social media and online activities
Troubleshoot basic tech issues in Bulgarian

content:
# Technology & Media

## Grammar Explanation

### Technology Vocabulary

**Devices**:
- Компютър (kompyutăr) - computer
- Лаптоп (laptop) - laptop
- Телефон (telefon) - phone
- Таблет (tablet) - tablet
- Клавиатура (klaviatura) - keyboard
- Мишка (mishka) - mouse

**Internet & Digital**:
- Интернет (internet) - internet
- Имейл (imeyl) - email
- Уебсайт (uebsayt) - website
- Приложение (prilozhenie) - app/application
- Софтуер (softuer) - software
- Файл (fayl) - file
- Парола (parola) - password

**Social Media**:
- Профил (profil) - profile
- Публикация (publikatsiya) - post
- Коментар (komentar) - comment
- Харесване (haresvane) - like
- Споделяне (spodelene) - share
- Фейсбук (Feysbook) - Facebook
- Инстаграм (Instagram) - Instagram

### Useful Phrases

- **Компютърът не работи** (Kompyutărăt ne raboti) - The computer doesn't work
- **Нямам интернет** (Nyamam internet) - I don't have internet
- **Забравих паролата си** (Zabravikh parolata si) - I forgot my password
- **Изпрати ми имейл** (Izprati mi imeyl) - Send me an email

## Cultural Notes

1. **Tech Hub**: Sofia is becoming a significant tech hub in Eastern Europe.

2. **Internet Penetration**: Bulgaria has high internet speeds and widespread coverage.

3. **Social Media**: Facebook and Instagram are most popular; Viber is widely used for messaging.

4. **E-Government**: Many government services available online (e-services).
